name: Smart Thermostat
brief: Local pairing + cloud control with firmware updates.
guideHtml:
Goal: View a smart camera's live feed. The camera streams via a phone app, stores clips in the cloud, and sits on home Wi-Fi.

Common paths:

  • Cloud account access: credential stuffing or phishing.
  • Local network path (AND): join home Wi-Fi (weak/default password or WPS) and access local interface/RTSP.
  • Default/weak setup: default admin password or unchanged stream key.

Pitfalls: Stealing the camera or DoS doesnâ€™t give viewing access; model steps that end with a working feed.
